author: dblevins
msg: Simple refactor, removed individual getInstance() methods in various classes (including	BeanManagr.getManager) to make it easier to see the static lookup usage and collapse it with other statics.   I.e. two calls to WebBeansContext.getInstance() can more easily be seen and combined into one.

author: covener
msg: core: Fail startup when the argument to ServerName looks like a glob
or a regular expression instead of a hostname (*?[]).  PR 39863

author: covener
msg: propose a simple mod_userdir backport for PR44076
